alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 2:59AM CST until December 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation likely with at least a glaze of ice expected to coat all outdoor surfaces. Total ice accumulations from a few hundredths of an inch up to two tenths of an inch of ice possible, with a small probability for a dusting of snow mainly north of interstate 80 late in the day. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Through 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact both the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Wintry mix of precipitation beginning as freezing rain, drizzle and a few ice pellets is expected across the area this morning. This mixed precipitation should transition to a cold rain across north central Kansas by afternoon...with the possibility of some light snowfall across parts of south central Nebraska, mainly north of interstate 80. In addition, there could be some pockets of fog which could further reduce visibilities at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
